mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, P.pno, P.pregdate, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno WHERE S.stat=001 AND S.uno=#{uno} OR P.uno=#{uno} GROUP BY P.pno

SELECT pno, pname, pdetail, pdata, pregdate, pduedate, U.uname, UPPER(SUBSTRING(U.uemail,1,1)) AS theFirstLetterOfEmail, CB.CODE_NAME AS profileBgColor, CA.CODE_NAME AS udepartment, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN CodeTable CA ON CA.CODE_TYPE='002' AND CA.CODE=U.udepartment LEFT JOIN CodeTable CB ON CB.CODE_TYPE='007' AND CB.CODE=U.profileBgColor WHERE pno=#{pno}

SELECT P.pno, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname FROM Project P LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno WHERE
P.pname like #{item} '%' AND
(S.stat=001 AND S.uno=#{uno} OR P.uno=#{uno})

SELECT U.uno, U.uname, S.stat, CA.CODE_NAME, UPPER(SUBSTRING(U.uemail,1,1)) AS theFirstLetterOfEmail, CB.CODE_NAME AS profileBgColor FROM ProjectMemberStat S LEFT JOIN User U ON S.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN CodeTable CA ON S.stat=CA.CODE AND CA.CODE_TYPE='010' LEFT JOIN CodeTable CB ON CB.CODE_TYPE='007' AND CB.CODE = U.profileBgColor WHERE S.pno=#{pno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Milestones WHERE pno=#{pno} AND mstatement=001

SELECT 'Milestone' AS tableName, M.mtitle AS title, U.uname, U.uno, M.mregdate AS regdate, mno AS identificationNo FROM Milestones M, User U WHERE M.pno=#{pno} AND M.uno = U.uno UNION ALL SELECT 'Issue' AS tableName, I.ititle AS title, U.uname, U.uno, I.iregdate AS regdate, ino AS identificationNo FROM Issues I, User U WHERE I.pno=#{pno} AND I.uno = U.uno ORDER BY regdate DESC
